sections.title: AccessibilityExtensionContext.holdRunningLockSync<sup>20+</sup>
sections.summary:
holdRunningLockSync(): void

持有RunningLock锁，持锁后，屏幕不会自动灭屏。

**需要权限**：ohos.permission.ACCESSIBILITY_E

sections.title: AccessibilityExtensionContext.unholdRunningLockSync<sup>20+</sup>
sections.summary:
unholdRunningLockSync(): void

释放RunningLock锁，恢复自动灭屏。

**需要权限**：ohos.permission.ACCESSIBILITY_EXTEN
